pages.text: The Demon King is the boss of the demon realm. He is very powerful, and a tier 3 spellbook is highly recommended. The Demon King drops the Demon Crystal, which is used in crafting the tier 4 spellbook. The Demon King can be summoned with the Demon Staff, which is found in structures in the Demon Realm.
The Demon Staff is found in structures in the Demon Realm, and contains
Demon Crystals are dropped by the Demon King boss
